news.title: Elton John, Kate Bush and more top UK artists sign letter urging UK government to protect their work from AI
news.summary: Elton John, Kate Bush, Paul McCartney, Mick Jagger and Annie Lennox are among the signatories.

news.title: Ron Sexsmith announce eight March 2026 Irish shows
news.summary: Tickets go on sale this Friday, September 19.

news.title: Chrissie Hynde collaborates with k.d lang on new rendition of ‘Me & Mrs Jones’
news.summary: The single is taken from Hynde’s upcoming album Chrissie Hynde & Pals Duets Special

news.title: Pussy Riot members sentenced to jail in Russia over anti-war performances
news.summary: Sentenced band member Diana Burkot said the Russian government has "no access to my physical body," but "even if I were in Russia, I would say the same thing: go fuck yourself."

news.title: Spain says it will pull out of Eurovision if Israel stays in contest
news.summary: It becomes the fifth country to threaten to exit the contest, following Ireland, the Netherlands, Slovenia and Iceland.

news.title: Political sportswriter Dave Zirin speaks to press ahead of documentary screening
news.summary: "The NFL is not here to plant trees, America is here to plant a flag," said Zirin of the upcoming NFL game at Croke Park.

news.title: Kula Shaker announce new album Wormslayer, release new single ‘Good Money’
news.summary: The new record comes out January 30, 2026.

news.title: Robert Redford, Oscar-winning actor and director, dies aged 89
news.summary: Redford was a Godfather of independent cinema, creating the nonprofit Sundance Institute, known for its annual Sundance Film Festival.

Picture This add new Christmas gig in Gleneagle Arena
